subject: Recommendation
preview: Hi Mark, Just checking to make sure you received the email?

full_threads.body:
Hi Mark, 

Just checking to make sure you received the email?

Hi Mark, 

I have just sent a copy of the email to yourself and Kate. Please let me know if you would like any changes and what you think?

Hi Heath, haven't seen your mock up yet?

Cheers

Mark Knox

0404 055 995

helloworld Revesby

2B Brett Street

PO Box 629

Revesby NSW 2212

T: 02 9772 2066

FINALIST 2015 "Outstanding Specialised Retail Business"

"Without a travel agent you're on your own"

Yes Heath, Helloworld branding.

Cheers

Mark Knox
CruiseWorld Holidays
0404 055 995

Thanks Kate and Mark, 

Yes no probs leave it with me. I will get this over to you tomorrow for approval. Question: Do you want me to use the Helloworld branding?

Yes that's fine with me. Heath, can you put something together?

Cheers

Mark Knox
CruiseWorld Holidays
0404 055 995

Hi Mark and Heath,

Sorry I thought I replied to this email first thing this morning.

Thanks for helping with the EDM. How much text do we need? I am thinking we would want to say something like below, if we have the space etc:

"Hello from the Team at Helloworld Travel Revesby,

We are back in the office now to help with all of your holiday plans for the future and rebooking your credits held from the past couple of years. Our office is open Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays from 9am to 5pm. We are working to appointments where possible.

We would love to help you plan your next trip. We have great deals on European River Cruises, Tours and Cruises in Canada and Alaska and much much more.

Let us help you navigate travel in a Covid Safe way. We have access to the up to date information for travelling to all corners of the world.

We look forward to hearing from you soon"

Is this ok?

Best regards,

Kate Thornburg |Travel Consultant

helloworld Travel RevesbyP: 02 9772 2066

** Please note my work days are Tuesday, Thursday and Friday's from 9am-5:00pm. **

Haha! It's actually what my close mates call me... When we were much (much) younger my mum did the honour of blurting out 'Heathy' in front of them. It stuck of course : )

I'll import your list and await the content for the blast. Speak soon,

Sorry I meant to say Heath (my fat fingers)

Mark Knox

Hi Mark, 

Ok sure, a blank canvas is totally fine. I have just setup an account for you. You should receive an email to mark.knox3@bigpond.com asking you to confirm your email address. Once that is done, let me know? 

Regarding Meryl's website, sure we will be happy to help out :)

Thanks Heath. No, I don't have anything set up with Mail Chimp. I'm attaching our database from Helloworld in excel. Kate, what would you like to be said in the comms? Welcome back and trading days?, Promotion(s)?

Heath will call you soon about establishing another Website for my wife (Meryl) psychology practice opening around May next year.

Cheers

Mark Knox

Hi Mark, 

We can help you with this. 

Do you have MailChimp account already? If not, let me know and I will send you our agency link. We are an agency partner of MailChimp :)

We will:

  • Import your list of contacts
  • Create the first email for you (this can become a template for subsequent emails)
  • Schedule and send the campaign

This is normally a billable service, but I'm happy to sneak this first one in for you all things considered. We will record a how-to style video so you/the team can administer as well.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath, can you recommend anyone to help us with our EDM as we need to start communicating more with our clients. Helloworld H/O are still understaff and can't assist us yet. I have a data base of about 1,100 and have been told by Helloworld to use Mail Chimp. So I need someone who can help design the message of our staff are needing and distribute. Any ideas?


Cheers


Mark Knox

0404 055 995
